meta.title: Anthony Dugois – Associate Professor, PhD in Computer Science
meta.description: Personal page of Anthony Dugois, Associate Professor at Université Marie & Louis Pasteur in Besançon.

header.title: Anthony Dugois
header.subtitle: Associate Professor at Université Marie & Louis Pasteur

news.content: I will be present at the Fall school MoMA (Modern Optimization Methods and Models in Algorithm Design) in Aussois. See you there!
Presented our paper "Approximation Bounds for SLACK on Identical Parallel Machines" at Euro-Par 2025 in Dresden.
Our paper "Approximation Bounds for SLACK on Identical Parallel Machines" has been accepted at Euro-Par 2025 (nominated in the Best Paper session).
Started as Associate Professor at Université Marie & Louis Pasteur.
